reviews.text: I had one look and immediately fell in love before tasting this delicious delight. This pizza is so good i look forward to purchasing more.
Absolutely a miss-leading online menu price wise . I asked for a large pizza(supreme style) and was bill d for a deep dish hand tossed pizza $40.!! Ouch!...
Always enjoy their Supremo Sicilian Thick Pizza & assorted Gelato.  Always pleasant staff.
